dialog.undo_message: Looks like you didn't save your changes! What would you like to do with them?

status.success: All done! We've imported your codes into the system.

coupon-codes.label: Codes
coupon-codes.helper_text: Paste multiple space-separated codes in the field above to add all of them at once. Importing duplicate codes clears their usage stats.
coupon-codes.v8n_required: Please add at least one code

dialog.undo_message: Looks like you didn't save your changes! What would you like to do with them?

error.invalid_form: These parameters won't generate any codes. Please make sure that the length of the code is greater than the length of the prefix, does not exceed 50 characters in total and that the code itself does not contain spaces.

prefix.label: Prefix
prefix.helper_text: The length value is inclusive of this prefix.

example.label: Examples
example.helper_text: This is what the generated codes will look like.

name.label: Name
name.helper_text: Coupon name is visible to the customers.
name.v8n_required: Please enter a name for this coupon.
name.v8n_too_long: Please shorten the name to 50 characters or less.

rules.label: Rules
rules.helper_text: Add rules to define how this coupon will affect order total. You can get started by selecting one of the examples from the dropdown on top right.
rules.v8n_required: Please add at least one discount rule in this section.
rules.v8n_too_long: Unfortunately we are unable to store that many discount rules at the moment. Please reduce the number of rules in this section until this message disappears.
rules.repeat_price_amount_discount_summary: for each {{from}}, {{adjustment}}¤ on the next item
rules.repeat_price_percentage_discount_summary: for each {{from}}, {{adjustment, percent}} on the next item

coupon-codes.label: Codes
coupon-codes.delete_message: Please confirm that you'd like to remove this code from the item.

dialog.undo_message: Looks like you didn't save your changes! What would you like to do with them?

code.label: Code
code.helper_text: The string value of this coupon code which your customer will add to their cart to use this coupon.
code.v8n_too_long: Coupon code must be 50 characters or less
code.v8n_has_spaces: Please remove spaces from the coupon code

card.source_MIT: This transaction was initiated by the merchant
card.source_CIT: This transaction was initiated by the customer

delete.delete_prompt: Are you sure you'd like to remove this coupon code? You won't be able to bring it back.

card.line_2: Added on {{ date_created, date }} at {{ date_created, time }}

attributes.label: Attributes
attributes.delete_message: Please confirm that you'd like to remove this attribute from the item.

dialog.undo_message: Looks like you didn't save your changes! What would you like to do with them?

name.label: Name
name.helper_text: Name of this attribute. It does not have to be unique.
name.v8n_too_long: Please choose a name that is 500 characters long or less.

value.label: Value
value.helper_text: Value of this attribute. Attribute values are automatically HTML-escaped.
value.v8n_required: Please provide a value for this attribute.
value.v8n_too_long: Unfortunately we can't store values that are more than 1000 characters long.

visibility.label: Visibility
visibility.helper_text: Controls who can see this attribute. Public attributes can be shown to anyone, including customers. Private attributes are more suitable for configuration or technical details which are irrelevant to the public. Restricted attributes can only be viewed with the OAuth client that created them.

delete.delete_prompt: Are you sure you'd like to remove this attribute? You won't be able to bring it back.

number-of-uses-allowed.label: Uses per coupon
number-of-uses-allowed.helper_text: The maximum number of times this coupon can be used. Leave blank for unlimited uses.
number-of-uses-allowed.v8n_too_small: Please enter a value greater or equal to 0.

number-of-uses-allowed-per-customer.label: Uses per customer
number-of-uses-allowed-per-customer.helper_text: The maximum number of times a single customer can use this coupon. Leave blank for unlimited uses.
number-of-uses-allowed-per-customer.v8n_too_small: Please enter a value greater or equal to 0.

number-of-uses-allowed-per-code.label: Uses per code
number-of-uses-allowed-per-code.helper_text: The maximum number of times a single code can be used. Leave blank for unlimited uses.
number-of-uses-allowed-per-code.v8n_too_small: Please enter a value greater or equal to 0.

product-code-restrictions.label: Product code restrictions
product-code-restrictions.placeholder: Enter a product code and hit Enter
product-code-restrictions.helper_text: We'll apply this coupon only if one of the rules in the list matches the product code. Wildcards are allowed.
product-code-restrictions.v8n_too_long: Unfortunately we are unable to store that many product code restrictions at the moment. Please reduce the number of rules in this section until this message disappears.

multiple-codes-allowed.label: Allow multiple codes on the same order

exclude-category-discounts.label: Don't apply category discounts with this coupon

exclude-line-item-discounts.label: Don't apply line item discounts with this coupon

start-date.label: Start date
start-date.helper_text: The date and time when this coupon will become active. Leave blank to activate immediately.

end-date.label: End date
end-date.helper_text: The date and time when this coupon will expire. Leave blank for no expiration.

item-option-restrictions.label: Item option restrictions
item-option-restrictions.helper_text: This restricts the usage of a coupon code based on an item option's name and value. When defined, the coupon will only apply to items with the specified option name and value. Wildcards are allowed.
item-option-restrictions.v8n_too_long: Unfortunately we are unable to store that many item option restrictions at the moment. Please reduce the number of rules in this section until this message disappears.

category-restrictions.label: Item category restrictions
category-restrictions.helper_text: Limit which categories this coupon applies to. All changes are saved automatically.

customer-attribute-restrictions.label: Customer attribute restrictions
customer-attribute-restrictions.helper_text: This restricts the usage of the coupon based on an attribute name and value. When defined, the coupon will only apply if the customer has the specified attribute name and value. Wildcards are allowed.
customer-attribute-restrictions.v8n_too_long: Unfortunately we are unable to store that many customer attribute restrictions at the moment. Please reduce the number of rules in this section until this message disappears.

customer-subscription-restrictions.label: Customer subscription restrictions
customer-subscription-restrictions.placeholder: Enter a product code and hit Enter
customer-subscription-restrictions.helper_text: This restricts the usage of the coupon based on product codes in the current customer's active subscriptions. When defined, the coupon will only apply if the customer has an active subscription with a matching product code. Wildcards are allowed.
customer-subscription-restrictions.caption: Add this code
customer-subscription-restrictions.v8n_too_long: Unfortunately we are unable to store that many subscription restrictions at the moment. Please reduce the number of rules in this section until this message disappears.

customer-auto-apply.label: Auto apply coupon for matching customers
customer-auto-apply.helper_text: If enabled, when a customer authenticates on the checkout, this coupon will automatically apply if the above two customer restrictions are met.

inclusive-tax-rate.label: Tax rate
inclusive-tax-rate.helper_text: The tax rate to apply to the coupon in tax-inclusive mode. This is a decimal value from 0 to 1.
inclusive-tax-rate.v8n_too_small: Please enter a value greater or equal to 0.
inclusive-tax-rate.v8n_too_big: Please enter a value less than or equal to 1.

delete.delete_prompt: This action is irreversible. Are you sure you want to delete this coupon?
